txt.en: Mozlut is an enormous Warg who has been rampaging across the battlefield. Drive off this foul beast.
'With this horrific beast driven off, patrols securing our flanks can resume unencumbered.'
Find Hlóthi and inform him that you were able to drive off the beast.
Mozlut is an enormous Warg who has been rampaging across the battlefield. Drive off this foul beast.

The ferocious Warg Mozlut has been rampaging across Elderslade. This beast has struck fear in the hearts of many proud dwarves and feasted upon several patrols.\n\nDrive back this foul creature, so that patrols may resume throughout the area.
Mozlut is an enormous Warg who has been rampaging across the battlefield. Drive off this foul beast.
